name: SOMASmartHome
0:
”Alexa, close Bedroom”
”Alexa, open Bedroom”
”Alexa, set Bedroom to 50”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your SOMA Smart Shades or SOMA Tilt devices with Alexa.

You need at least one SOMA Smart Shades or SOMA Tilt device and SOMA Connect hub for this skill to function.

To get started:
1) Download the Smart Shades app. Set up the devices using the guidelines provided in the app.
2) Find out your SOMA Connect ID. In the Smart Shades app > Left menu > SOMA Connect
3) Use the Alexa app to enable the skill, link the account with the SOMA Connect ID and discover the devices
